title: CAN'T START UP MY GAME !!!!!!!!! HELP
body: I CAN'T START UP MY GAME I  TRIED EVERYTHING AND EVERY OTHER SOLUTIONS ON NETWORK NOTHING WORK .. ALSO I DON'T HAVE THE AIR LOL CLIENT FOLDERS /:

replies.body: I'd like to help you out, but there isn't a whole lot of information I can use here.  Are you having issues at the loading screen, the patcher, or another section of the game?  Are you receiving any errors and what does it say?  Any detailed information on this can help!

i can't open my game just the logo shows and then disappears !!! sometimes i delete the whole game and re-install it it works but as soon as i shut the game can't open it again i tried every solution on the internet nothing works :/

The patcher needs to launch, but it seems like your OS or permission settings is not allowing it to.  As a first step, go over the instructions in the [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to fix this up.  Let me know how that works for you!
